page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO RIPPINGALE
page.content:
The area covered in this survey is situated on the edge of{South {Lincolnshire}fenland.Three villages were covered in the survey; {Dunsby.........(pop 107) {Dowsby.........(pop 191) * 1981 census {Rippingale.....(pop 587)
When the name of Rippingale appears on each page title,the information on that page refers,in fact,to all three villages. The information in the text was gathered from two sources; a random household questionnaire and written contributions of specialised knowledge from members of the community.
